title: These regulations shall be called as ―Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations for Maha
clause_text: These regulations shall be called as ―Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations for Maharashtra‖ (hereinafter called ―These Regulations‖ or "Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations" - ‗UDCPR‘ )
